comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.text:
In particular, for transitionend, animationstart, animationend, animationiteration.

As far as I can tell, WebKit doesn't have on* attributes/properties for these; not sure about Presto and Trident.
comments.raw_text:
In particular, for transitionend, animationstart, animationend, animationiteration.

As far as I can tell, WebKit doesn't have on* attributes/properties for these; not sure about Presto and Trident.
